newsitem.title: USA: Engineering Animation names financial officer.
newsitem.headline: Engineering Animation names financial officer.

text.p: Engineering Animation Inc said Monday that Jerome Behar has been named vice president of finance and chief financial officer
Behar succeeds Michael Jewell, who is leaving EAI to manage a family business in Seattle.
In another development, Adrian Sannier has been promoted to vice president and general manager of EAI's interactive and custom animation business units, a new position.
EAI provides 3D visualization technology for education and entertainment needs.
